typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EMPTAB
source(output(
		DID as string,
		DName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DEPTTAB
EMPTAB, DEPTTAB join(DEPTNO == DID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
